text: Balaji Telefilms is an Indian company that makes soap operas, reality TV, comedy, game shows, and other TV programs in several Indian languages. Balaji had a partnership with White Leaf Productions from 1997 to 2006. Balaji Telefilms is promoted by Ekta Kapoor and Shobha Kapoor and is a public company listed at Bombay Stock Exchange and National Stock Exchange of India. ==Current productions== Series Genre Channel First aired Episodes () Kumkum Bhagya Drama Zee TV 2082 Synopsis: A rockstar marries a middle- class girl who is a college professor because of a misunderstanding caused by his sister. They hate each other while getting married, but fall in love because of their loving natures. Later, the story shifted its focus to the couple's twin daughters as both of them fall in love with the same guy. Yeh Hai Chahatein Drama Star Plus 596 Synopsis: A rockstar marries a gynecologist to avenge his brother's death and obtain custody of his child but falls in love with her only to be separated again. Bhagya Lakshmi Drama Zee TV 184 Synopsis: The rich illustrious family marries their only son to a poor girl because of his Kundali Dosh (Horoscope Flaw). The boy has a flamboyant nature whereas the girl is simple. Bade Achhe Lagte Hain 2 Drama Sony TV 140 Synopsis: A mature love story of two individuals in their thirties who find love after they are forcibly married. Naagin 6 Supernatural fiction Colors TV 10 Synopsis: The traitors of India helping a neighboring country started biological warfare by releasing a poisonous liquid into the water bodies, causing a pandemic. A professor seeks the help of a Shesh Naagin to hunt down the enemies of the country and find the antidote to save lives. Parineetii Drama Colors TV 22 Synopsis: The series explores the lives of two best friends Parineet and Neeti whose lives are intertwined when they are married to the same man! ==Past productions== ===National=== Year Title Network Genre First aired Last aired Episodes Language 1995 Padosan DD Metro Drama Hindi Captain House Horror Hindi Mano Ya Na Mano Zee TV Thriller 68 Hindi 1995–1997 Hum Paanch (season 1) Sitcom 261 Hindi 1999 Bandhan DD Metro Drama Hindi Kanyadaan Sony Entertainment Television Drama Hindi 2000 Itihaas DD National Thriller Hindi Kaun Horror Hindi Kasam Drama Hindi Kashti Zee TV Drama Hindi Kavita Metro Gold Drama Hindi 2000–2001 Kundali Drama 52 Hindi 2000-2002 Koshish...
